title: KIRCHHEIMER CHART for Will
author: Hanna Kirchheimer Grossman
description: Comprehensive genealogical chart and historical research covering the Kirchheimer family from earliest trackable ancestor Wolf Loew (c.1695) through American immigration and beyond, including related families (Hanauer, Westheimer, etc.)
content_summary: Translation of article about Hilde Rosenfeld Kirchheimer from 'Zu Recht wieder Anwalt. Jüdische Rechtsanwälte aus Berlin nach 1945'
Descent chart for Kirchheimer family of Houston, Texas
Detailed genealogical information on Wolf Loew (c.1695-1795) and descendants
Hanauer family lineage from Naftali (Nathan) Herz Hanauer
Westheimer family connections through Joseph Aron Westheimer
American immigration records and family development in Texas
Historical context including European Jewish history, laws, and persecutions
Detailed biographical information on multiple generations
Legal and business records from various time periods
notes: Contains extensive research by family genealogist Hanna Kirchheimer Grossman
Includes translation of German biographical article
Contains detailed historical context and documentation
Cross-references multiple historical records and sources
Covers approximately 318 years of family history
Includes both European and American family branches
